constantValues: Activity offered by the organization to satisfy its customer's needs. Each service activity includes date, time, duration, and required resources.

definitions.description: Activity offered by the organization to satisfy its customer's needs. Each service activity includes date, time, duration, and required resources.

members.name: description

constantValues: Type additional information to describe the service activity, such as key talking points or objectives.

members.description: Type additional information to describe the service activity, such as key talking points or objectives.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.name: lastOnHoldTime

constantValues: Contains the date and time stamp of the last on hold time.

members.description: Contains the date and time stamp of the last on hold time.

members.name: onHoldTime

constantValues: Shows how long, in minutes, that the record was on hold.

members.description: Shows how long, in minutes, that the record was on hold.

foreignKeyAttribute.explanation: Place holder that merges with the better attribute description from the ActivityCommon entity
foreignKeyAttribute.name: id
id

constantValues: Choose the service scheduled to be performed during the service activity.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the service scheduled to be performed during the service activity.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the service level agreement (SLA) that you want to apply to the service appointment record.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the service level agreement (SLA) that you want to apply to the service appointment record.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Last SLA that was applied to this email. This field is for internal use only.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Last SLA that was applied to this email. This field is for internal use only.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

members.name: stateCode

constantValues: Shows whether the service activity is open, completed, or canceled. Completed and canceled service activities are read-only and can't be edited.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'ServiceActivity' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: stateCode_display

members.description: Shows whether the service activity is open, completed, or canceled. Completed and canceled service activities are read-only and can't be edited.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statusCode_display' is added to the 'ServiceActivity' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statusCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: statusCode_display

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

members.name: isAllDayEvent

constantValues: Select whether the service activity is an all-day event to make sure the required resources are scheduled for the full day.

members.description: Select whether the service activity is an all-day event to make sure the required resources are scheduled for the full day.

members.name: location

constantValues: Type the location where the service activity will take place, such as a conference room, customer office, or other venue.

members.description: Type the location where the service activity will take place, such as a conference room, customer office, or other venue.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the site or location where the service activity will be performed.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the site or location where the service activity will be performed.
